name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-meeting-audio-state-nodejs
title: Meeting Audio Mute/Unmute
shortDescription: This sample tab application demonstrates how to control meeting audio in Microsoft Teams by muting and unmuting using the Incoming Client Audio API.
longDescription: This sample tab application allows users to mute and unmute audio during Teams meetings by leveraging the Incoming Client Audio API. It features RSC permissions, supports Teams themes, and offers a user-friendly interface for toggling audio states seamlessly within the meeting side panel.

thumbnails.alt: Teams meeting audio Mute/Unmute using NodeJS.

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
